description: From quiz +‎ -y. Sense 2 possibly influenced by English inquisitive.

adjectives.description: quizzy (comparative more quizzy, superlative most quizzy)

examples: […]  as in all other balls, there was a certain sprinkling of fine ladies, and quizzy gentlemen, as well as of quizzy ladies and fine gentlemen, so that the several partnerships were as it might be, ill or well-arranged;  […]
